basic_info.name: Why choose Sir CV Raman Institute of Technology & sciences?

Section.name: About Sir CV Raman Institute of Technology & Sciences
Section.description:
Sir CV Raman Institute of Technology & Sciences was established in 2009. It is approved AICTE and affiliated to JNTUA, Anantapur. Sir C.V. Raman Institute of Technology & Sciences offers 4 years Engineering Undergraduate Programme (B.Tech.), 2 years Postgraduate Programme in Master of Technology (M.Tech) and 3 years Programme in Polytechnic.
Establishment Year
2009
College Type
Private-Self Finance
Principal of the College
Dr. Indudhara Reddy
Approval
AICTE
Total Books
22000 volumes
Campus Strength
600+
How to Reach
1 km from Tadpatri, 422 km from Chennai
